contentrichtext.text: '''Loughton''' may refer to: ==Places in the United Kingdom== *[[Loughton]], Essex **[[Loughton Camp]], an [[Iron Age]] [[hill fort]] in [[Epping Forest]] near Loughton **[[Loughton Urban District]], a [[Local government in England|local government]] district from 1900 to 1933 *[[Loughton, Milton Keynes]] **[[All Saints Church, Loughton]], the oldest church in Loughton, Milton Keynes **[[Loughton Orient F.C.]], a football club from Loughton, Milton Keynes that played in the [[South Midlands League]] from 1994 to 2007 *[[Loughton, Shropshire]] ==Other uses== *[[Loughton (surname)]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
